title.rendered: Official Opening of Regent College London

content.rendered:
The Madison House site of Regent College London, in Wembley, Northwest London, UK, was opened officially by the Lord Mayor of Brent, Councillor Kana Naheerathan, on the 17th December 2014. Madison House is home to the Higher Education College, the Further Education Division (Regent Skills Training), and the Regent English Academy.

Close to one thousand people use this provision, where a vibrant and diverse community of students enjoy studying at various levels to attain their educational objectives. The Mayor was able to spend time with staff and students and conducted the ‘ribbon-cutting ceremony’ to declare the site open for business.

Enjoy this video record!
